TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthenticationTicket extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供存取票證之屬性和值的權限，票證是搭配表單驗證使用，以識別使用者。

span.span: Provides access to properties and values of the ticket used with forms authentication to identify users.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來建立物件，表示表單驗證所用來識別已驗證的使用者驗證票證。The class is used to create an object that represents the authentication ticket that is used by forms authentication to identify an authenticated user. 加密的字串儲存在 cookie 中，或在 URL 中的來回轉換的屬性和值的表單驗證票證。The properties and values of a forms-authentication ticket are converted to and from an encrypted string that is stored in a cookie or in the URL. 類別會提供方法，以建立可以儲存在 cookie 中，或從 URL 中的字串值。The class provides an method to create a string value that can be stored in a cookie or in the URL from a . 類別也會提供方法，以建立物件從加密的驗證票證擷取自表單驗證 cookie 或 URL。The class also provides a method to create a object from the encrypted authentication ticket retrieved from the forms-authentication cookie or the URL. 目前已驗證的使用者可以使用存取屬性類別。The for the current authenticated user can be accessed using the property of the class. 您可以存取目前轉換的物件屬性的目前做為類型。You can access the current object by casting the property of the current as type . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將儲存的結果方法中使用 cookie並將使用者重新導向至傳回 URL方法。The following code example stores the result of the method in a cookie using the and redirects the user to the URL returned from the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormsAuthenticationTicketClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketClass/CS/formsauthenticationticketclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormsAuthenticationTicketClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketClass/VB/formsauthenticationticketclassvb.aspx#1)]

param.name: isPersistent
param.span: 如果票證將存放於持續性 Cookie 中 (跨瀏覽器工作階段儲存)，則為 ，否則為 。

param.name: timeout

span.span: The time, in minutes, for which the authentication ticket is valid.

summary.span: 使用 Cookie 名稱和到期資訊來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a cookie name and expiration information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式所建立的物件會有值設定為值屬性，值為 2，值的目前本機日期和時間，的空值字串 ("")，以及值設定為目前的本地日期和時間加上的值，這個值`timeout`參數。The object created by this constructor will have a value set to the value of the property, a value of 2, an value of the current local date and time, a value of an empty string (""), and an value that is set to the current local date and time plus the value of the `timeout` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會使用未提供的建構函式來建立`cookiePath`參數屬性傳回的值屬性; 否則 [版本] 屬性會傳回提供給的值建構函式。If the is created using a constructor that does not supply a `cookiePath` parameter, the property returns the value of the property; otherwise, the version property returns the value supplied to the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性值目前登入的使用者。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有已登入的使用者，屬性會是`null`嘗試轉型時，您會收到編譯器例外狀況屬性設為物件。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. span.span: The when the forms-authentication ticket was originally issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，代表本地日期和表單驗證票證已發出的時間。The property represents the local date and time when the forms-authentication ticket was issued. 方法會使用屬性值，以判斷是否日期和時間的表單驗證票證更新的需求，並使用屬性值，以判斷新日期和時間。The method uses the property value to determine whether the date and time of a forms-authentication ticket needs to be renewed and also uses the property value to determine the new date and time. 當更新票證時，屬性更新為本機日期和時間。When a ticket is renewed, the property is updated to the local date and time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性值目前登入的使用者。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有已登入的使用者，屬性會是`null`嘗試轉型時，您會收到編譯器例外狀況屬性設為物件。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會使用未提供的建構函式來建立`userData`參數，屬性會傳回空字串 ("");否則，[版本] 屬性會傳回提供給的值建構函式。If the is created using a constructor that does not supply a `userData` parameter, the property returns an empty string (""); otherwise, the version property returns the value supplied to the constructor. 您可以使用屬性來儲存與其他使用者資訊，將不會維護由屬性值。You can use the property to store additional user information with the that is not maintained by the property values. > [!NOTE] > 您應該限制中儲存的資料數量屬性。You should limit the amount of data stored in the property. 您必須確定大小屬性不會導致無效的 cookie 或過長的 URL。You must ensure that the size of the property does not result in an invalid cookie or an excessively long URL. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性值目前登入的使用者。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有已登入的使用者，屬性會是`null`嘗試轉型時，您會收到編譯器例外狀況屬性設為物件。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. The version number of the ticket.
The default is 2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會使用未提供的建構函式來建立`version`參數屬性會傳回 2，否則 [版本] 屬性傳回的值提供給建構函式。If the is created using a constructor that does not supply a `version` parameter, the property returns 2; otherwise, the version property returns the value supplied to the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性值目前登入的使用者。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有已登入的使用者，屬性會是`null`嘗試轉型時，您會收到編譯器例外狀況屬性設為物件。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties/CS/formsauthenticationticketpropertiescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties/VB/formsauthenticationticketpropertiesvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Forms Authentication Provider
